doc.field: New York University Collection of Contemporary Composers' Websites
New York University Collection of Contemporary Composers' Websites

Tom Baker is a composer, guitarist, improviser, and electronic musician who is in Seattle new-music scene. The website contains a calendar, compositions, guitar pieces and improvisations, CD recordings, his projects, press and reviews, and a blog.

Also includes the blog for the Seattle composers' salon, which were an informal presentation series of finished works and works in progress by Pacific Northwestern composers and performers. The Tom Baker Quartet is a jazz quartet made up of Jesse Canterbury on clarinets, Greg Campbell on drums, Brian Cobb on bass, and Tom Baker on guitar. The website contains tour dates and a video and image gallery. Triptet was a improvisational group made up of Michael Monhart (saxophones and electronics), Tom Baker (fretless guitars, theremin and electronics), and Greg Campbell (percussion, french horn, and electronics). The website contains images, videos, tour dates, and some of the trio's music.
Crawl was limited to domains and subdomains of tombakermusic.com and tombakercomposer.com in order to remain within the collection scope and data constraints.
